faq.question: What is Local Bites?
faq.answer: Local Bites is an online platform facilitating food delivery from local restaurants and markets. We aim to connect local restaurants with customers in order to provide a convenient and efficient food delivery service.

faq.question: How do I place an order?
faq.answer: Pick a restaurant or market from our partners. Browse their menu and add items to your cart. Once you are ready, proceed to checkout and fill preferences or use vouchers. You can pay with card, ApplePay, GooglePay, or cash on delivery.

faq.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq.answer: We accept card payments, ApplePay, GooglePay, and cash on delivery.

faq.question: Is it safe to pay online?
faq.answer: Yes, it is safe to pay online. We use Stripe, a secure payment gateway to process your payment. Your card details are encrypted and are not stored on our servers.

faq.question: How do I contact a restaurant?
faq.answer:
You can contact the restaurant directly by phone. The phone number is displayed on the restaurant's page by accessing the info button on the top right corner.

You can also call the restaurant from the order details page.

faq.question: How long does the delivery take?
faq.answer: The delivery time depends on the restaurant and the distance from your location.

faq.question: Can I cancel an order?
faq.answer: You can cancel an order if the restaurant has not started preparing it. You can check the status of your order in the order details page. Contact the restaurant directly to cancel an order in exceptional cases.

faq.question: What if I have an issue with my order?
faq.answer:
Depending on the situation please contact the restaurant or us directly.

Situations to be solved by the restaurant: order not started preparing, order is very late, missing products, etc.

Situations to contact us: can't place order, can't pay, can't see my order, etc.

faq.question: Can I place multiple orders at once?
faq.answer: Yes, you can place multiple orders at once.
